meanings.definition: A group of people united in a common purpose or interest.
meanings.sent1: The confraternity of students worked together to clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: The confraternity of artists gathered to showcase their paintings.
meanings.sent3: The confraternity of bakers decided to bake a giant cake for the town fair.
meanings.sent4: The confraternity of athletes sprinted towards the finish line in unison.
meanings.sent5: The confraternity of musicians harmonized beautifully during the concert.

meanings.definition: An association, especially a religious one, dedicated to charitable or religious work.
meanings.sent1: The local confraternity organized a food drive for the homeless.
meanings.sent2: The confraternity at the church volunteered at the shelter every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The confraternity of gardeners prayed for a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent4: The confraternity of monks silently worked in the monastery gardens.
meanings.sent5: The confraternity of nuns sang hymns while serving the community.
